app_id.title: App ID
app_id.description: The ID of the app to filter items from

sort_by.title: Sort By
sort_by.description: Field external_id to sort by (e.g., 'created_on', 'last_edit_on', or a field external_id)

sort_desc.title: Sort Descending
sort_desc.description: True to sort in descending order (newest first)

limit.title: Batch Size
limit.description: Number of items per batch (default: 15). Set to 0 to retrieve all items.

offset.title: Offset
offset.description: Number of items to skip (for pagination)

filters.title: Filters
filters.description: Filter criteria as JSON object with field_id/external_id as keys
